message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm thinking a price of $13,000 would be fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is significantly lower than what I had in mind.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is a very competitive price for a product of this value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,500, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500?
Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best possible price, and I respect that.  Let's split the difference - $11,000, and we have a deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit below $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500?
